mapper.select: SELECT * FROM store s LEFT OUTER JOIN storeimgs ss ON s.storeid = ss.storeid GROUP BY storename HAVING storename LIKE CONCAT('%',#{txt},'%')
mapper.update: UPDATE store SET cateid=#{cateid}, storename=#{storename}, storeintroduce=#{storeintroduce}, storetel=#{storetel}, storestatus=#{storestatus}, storeinfo=#{storeinfo}, storeaddr=#{storeaddr} WHERE storeid=#{storeid}
